Very bad experience with Swiggy. I ordered food with the assurance of 30-minute delivery, but it was delivered after 1 hour and 10 minutes, which is unacceptable. By the time the food arrived, it was completely cold and ruined. On top of that, there was no proper customer support available in the app to report the issue or get help. False delivery promises and lack of support show very poor service standards. This experience has seriously reduced my trust in Swiggy. Needs major improvement.
